Package Repo

Interface RepositoryInterface<ID,T extends BaseEntity<ID>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemRepo
    public interface RepositoryInterface<ID,T extends BaseEntity<ID>>
    Interface for generic CRUD operations on a repository for a specific type.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • findOne

        java.util.Optional<T> findOne​(ID id)
        Find the entity with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - must be not null.
        Returns:
        an Optional encapsulating the entity with the given id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given id is null.
